{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Philately {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Philately Philately ( ; fi- LAT -É™-lee ) is the study of postage stamps and postal history. It also refers to the collection, appreciation and research activities on stamps and other philatelic products. Philately involves more than just stamp collecting or the study of postage; it is possible to be a philatelist without owning any stamps. For instance, the stamps being studied may be very rare or reside only in museums. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philately)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
